Question: iSpot.tv CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
iSpot.tv

Streaming Measurement Offering

- New suite of metrics for tracking audience consumption of CTV advertising at scale
- Provides streaming-first cross-platform view
- Includes investment weight view and Industry Share of Voice (SOV) metric
- Leverages TVision Insights technologies
- Represents a new big data foundation for new currencies and integrations with brands for unified, cross-platform measurement offerings
